Reviews.Title: Super great and easy to use camera
Reviews.Author: Mary Hall
Reviews.Content: The Nikon D5200 is a wonderfully easy to use camera. It takes beautiful pictures and the shutter speed is awesome!

ProductInfo.Features:
D5200 DX-Format Red Digital SLR Kit with 18-55mm VR Lens
2197 - 55-300mm f/4.5-5.6G ED VR AF-S DX NIKKOR Lens for Nikon Digital SLR
32GB Secure Digital SD Memory Card
Compact Deluxe Gadget Bag - DC74, ML-L3 Remote Control for D90, D5100, D3100, D3200
58mm UV, Polarizer & FLD Deluxe Filter kit (with carrying case), 60" Full Size Photo / Video Tripod
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon D5200 Red 32 GB SLR Camera with 18-55mm & 55-300mm VR Lens and Filters Bundle - Includes camera, 55-300mm NIKKOR Lens, 32GB Secure Digital SD Memory Card, Compact Deluxe Gadget Bag, ML-L3 Remote Control, Filter Kit, and Tripod
